channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: My boyfriend owns a house and earns more than me, but I still want a prenup. Is that wise?
item.description: “I recently learned about land that has been in my family for 150 years.”

item.title: Alibaba launches open source Qwen3 model that surpasses OpenAI o1 and DeepSeek R1
item.description: Qwen3’s open-weight release under an accessible license marks an important milestone, lowering barriers for developers and organizations.

item.title: ‘I’m very cynical’: My stepmother, 85, makes bizarre requests for money from my father’s $10M trust. Should I be concerned?
item.description: “He used a crappy lawyer to set up a very boilerplate trust agreement.”

item.title: ‘An argument ensued’: My mother entrusted my inheritance to her second husband. That’s when it all went horribly wrong.
item.description: “He is a managing director at a major bank and probably clears $800,000 per annum.”

item.title: ‘Real Housewives’ star Bethenny Frankel says she’s moving to Florida, but keeping her N.Y. properties
item.description: Frankel, a New York City native, says she is leaving the Big Apple behind and moving to Florida for her “personal and professional” growth.

item.title: Rachel McAdams lists her L.A. home for $4 million—is she staying in the South for good?
item.description: McAdams relocated her family to the South in order to escape the chaos of city life, and is selling her longtime Los Angeles home.

item.title: Is AI “normal”?

item.title: Ex-OpenAI CEO and power users sound alarm over AI sycophancy and flattery of users
item.description: Crucially, the turbulence also nudges many organizations to explore open-source models they can host, monitor, and fine-tune themselves.

item.title: Beyond A2A and MCP: How LOKA’s Universal Agent Identity Layer changes the game
item.description: The LOKA protocol, a proposed standard for AI agents from Carnegie Mellon University researchers, will give identities and intentions to agents.

item.title: Writer releases Palmyra X5, delivers near GPT-4.1 performance at 75% lower cost

item.title: 30 seconds vs. 3: The d1 reasoning framework that’s slashing AI response times
item.description: d1 framework changes boosts diffusion LLMs with novel reinforcement learning, unlocking efficient, problem-solving AI possibilities.
